mapper.name: Prompt for text
mapper.value:
# Task

Make posts about how pricing is almost ready to be increased for an in-person workshop sharing cutting-edge techniques for leveraging A.I. in social media automation. The price of admission to the workshop will be increasing from $49 to $99. The call to action should point people to sign up for the in-person workshop taking place in Edgewater, Miami, FL. The link to the workshop is here: https://lu.ma/7zpii5gi.

Make sure the content is simple, nicely formatted (multiple lines & clean spacing), and easy to read for the respective platforms: LinkedIn & X.com (formerly Twitter)

Also generate a prompt for generating an image to accompany these posts. The prompt should generate a very simple abstract image of the Egdewater neighborhood in Downtown Miami. No people or text in the image. The aesthetic should be astract, simple, and relaxing.

Your output should be JSON that adheres to the Pydantic schema below

## Event Details

Name: Automate your Social Media Marketing with A.I.
Date: 1-30-2025
Time: 6pm-9pm EST
Location: Office Logic in Miami, FL
Link: https://lu.ma/7zpii5gi

## Requirements

- Ensure the final output does not exceed the character limits for each platform

## Pydantic Schema for Output

class LinkedIn(BaseModel):
  text: str

class XDotCom(BaseModel):
  text: str

class GeneratedContent(BaseModel):
  linkedin: LinkedIn
  x_dot_com: XDotCom
  aped_image_prompt: str
